name: Lovely Runner
description: Lovely Runner is a 2024 South Korean television series starring Byeon Woo-seok and Kim Hye-yoon.

name: Gyaarah Gyaarah
description: Gyaarah Gyaarah is an Indian Hindi-language fantasy thriller series; it is an adaptation of the Korean drama Signal.

name: Destined With You
description: A lawyer bound by a centuries-old curse becomes entangled with a civil servant who holds the key to his freedom.

name: Business Proposal
description: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up on a blind date to scare away her friend's prospective suitor. However, plans go awry when he turns out to be Ha-ri's CEO and he makes a proposal.

name: Welcome
description: Sol-ah, a graphic designer who aspires to become a cartoonist, adopts a cat. Things take a turn when she discovers it can transform into a human being.
